name: Super Space Invader
description:
Welcome Space Cadet,

We have received top secret information of a new solar system showing signs of hostile alien life forms.

Your mission is to explore these new worlds and eliminate these pesky aliens into oblivion!

So pick your spaceship and buckle up! Its going to get tough out there if you're trying to rise up through

the ranks!

There's not many pilots left up to this task. The invaders are multiplying. There's no time.

Goodluck!

---

Super space Invader is a modern interpretation of a classic and brings the game to the third dimension.

Choose from 20+ distinctive spaceships to fight with. Explore 6 unique planets each with its own leaderboard

and aliens to invade.

Its Humanities turn to be the invader, earn your stripes and collect all 20 medals! Fight the increasingly

difficult waves of invaders and don't let their perplexing attack patterns dazzle you!

Stay in the fight long enough and you just might see a glimpse of their mothership. Shoot it down for bonus

points!



FEATURES:

- No ads
- High-quality visuals
- 3D Reimagined designs
- Simple and Intuitive controls
- Super Power Up
- 6 unique Planets + Each with its own leaderboard
- 6 MotherShips
- 36+ Aliens
- 20+ Spaceships to invade with
- 20 Medals
- Original Music from ASH, the Artist
